WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing for Failure to Follow Posting Guidelines:1) One request per ticket2) Features should be stated clearlyFor the items that Astry requested you open separate tickets for, please do.
WorkItem.Description:
Basic upgrades:
- Add a right click function on filters, then a drop down pops up with "Check all" and "Uncheck all"
- Add a right click function on buffs, "check all" and "uncheck all"
- Be able to search for items
- Be able to make a custom comparisons list, just add items that you want compared and then compare them. 
- Automatic version update (HELLO?)
- Filter only available options
- For gods sake let me change the width of item names in comparisons, so I can have the whole name on one line
Â 
I love rawr. I would love rawr 100 times more if these things where added.

Comments.Message:
Please post these feature requests according to the feature request posting guidelines. To answer them first in order:

- Sure, post a feature request.
- Obsoleted by Rawr3
- You can already via the popups, already have feature request to add that functionality to the main chart view
- Already planned, via upgrade lists
- Obsoleted by Rawr3
- Sure, post a feature request.
